amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the $375 million in funding for the Afghanistan Infrastructure Fund and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the $375 million in funding for the Afghanistan Infrastructure Fund and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 149 - 270 (Roll no. 480).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 149 - 270 (Roll no. 480).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Cicilline.
